pages.text: Throughout your journey you will find yourself needing to dabble with a variety of machines and devices which require power. TTLG's power (Lumens, or Lu for short) is simple in fuction and fairly easy to produce, with there being a variety of generators to choose from, however it is important to note that there are no batteries to store said power with.

pages.title: Not An RF Ripoff
pages.text: You could set down a few stacks of wires for a makeshift battery, I am not going to stop you if you try, but why.
